title: The Curse of Yandere Simulator Fan Games

media:group.media:title: The Curse of Yandere Simulator Fan Games
media:group.media:description:
Looking at every Yandere Simulator-inspired fan game and clone to see why none get finished. 

If you want to see more showcases of unusual, bizarre, or dark media consider subscribing! 

You'll find a current list of all these games (and a few that I missed), along with their status here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zdig_1KSOjwlwy252t3lF7a3cc7PkU6Sk49TipfkZ4Q/edit?usp=sharing

A terrific resource for some of these games’ history was Potatobrick’s “The Peculiar World of Yandere Sim Fan Games”, which you can find here: https://youtu.be/MKTPzgKD184

As mentioned in the video, here are the detailed documents about Love letter. Remember, read everything first, judge second, harass never. 

Dr.Apeis Defense Document
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1s5NEz-zMxDsgCw23UEpVxCKHGsfLSHO86r-NkBnZmrg/edit?usp=sharing Dr Apeis Defense

Magi’s Document
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oBGqfE3CVXYmRelGxkn9I2MSGwOWzr9FL8t2cA5KtlA/edit Magi’s document 

Shortcake’s Video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y7WqLRwMStI

Audio production by SteeleRam. Check out his stuff at https://twitter.com/Pkmlegend?t=-MPKCyf26c6UxXQ2_jJv8A&s=09


Thanks to the 70+ volunteers and developers who spoke to me about their experience developing these games. Do not harass anyone named (or unnamed) from any of these projects, including YandereDev.

Yandere Dev’s Debunk Page
https://yanderesimulator.com/debunk/
This is the “Debunk” page from YanDev’s blog which lists out criticisms of YanDev and his responses to those criticisms. 

YanDev Drama Showcases:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p1Zb90MFf20 The Right Opinion’s video is probably the most objective video on YanDev, and even though it gets a couple of small things wrong, does act as a strong introduction piece for the topic.


On the topic of Love letter: 

Dr.Apeis Defense Document
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1s5NEz-zMxDsgCw23UEpVxCKHGsfLSHO86r-NkBnZmrg/edit?usp=sharing Dr Apeis Defense

Also Brineexee, CorruptedDev, KGFTBZ, Coran, Red, YamaneDev, mitsusayo, Honey, blackle, life ends fans, thorn, YanDev, Dr Apeis, as well 

And of course, my Patrons.
